00:00 The Batman 2: Director Talks About an Entirely New Villain
Following the success of the first film, "The Batman 2" is undoubtedly one of the most anticipated superhero films. In an interview with Josh Horowitz, director Matt Reeves revealed new details about the sequel. His comments on the new villain were particularly exciting.

01:39 Frozen 3: The First Plot Details!
Animation fans have long been awaiting "Frozen 3". Until now, there had been little information about the sequel to the popular Disney series – but that has changed. According to several insiders, a recent Disney event in Shanghai finally revealed the first details of the plot.
